code: @Override protected RestChannelConsumer prepareRequest(RestRequest request, NodeClient client) throws IOException {     SqlTranslateRequest sqlRequest.     try (XContentParser parser = request.contentOrSourceParamParser()) {         sqlRequest = SqlTranslateRequest.fromXContent(parser).     }     return channel -> client.executeLocally(SqlTranslateAction.INSTANCE, sqlRequest, new RestToXContentListener<>(channel)). }
